title: ABN Compression Tester and Adapters – Dual Automotive Compression Gauge with 14mm and 18mm Compression Tester Adapter
feature: DIAGNOSE ENGINE PROBLEMS: The ABN Engine Compression Tester Kit with Compression Tool & Compression Tester Adapters accurately measures cylinder compression and allows you to identify and diagnose engine conditions such as a damaged piston, burned valve, blown head gasket, or worn ring

WORKS WITH YOUR VEHICLE: 14mm and 18mm included adapters snugly attach to the hose for a universal fit to suit all plug types on nearly all American domestic and imported vehicles and even small engines for your lawn mower, motorcycle, and snow blower; 14mm adapter has an Internal thread size of 14mm*1.25mm and outside thread size of 18mm*1.5mm
DUAL GAUGE: Compression checker has a 2.5-inch (6.4cm) dual calibrated scale that is easy to read from 50 PSI to 300 PSI and 3 Bar to 20 Bar (0 kPa to 2100 kPa);

EASY TO USE: Side release valve on compression gauge tester allows for repeated tests without the hassle of disconnecting the hose; Flexible 12-inch (30.5cm) rubber hose and long reach adapter for easy access
PACKAGE CONTENTS: Package includes (1) compression check gauge, (1) 14mm adapter, (1) 18mm adapter, and (1) rubber hose for your convenience
